column4: can anyone tell me how to install .tar.gz file, i have downloaded "realplay_10.0.9-1gutsy1.tar.gz". But i don't know how to install it.
first, open up the folder where you put the file, right click and select "extract here"
i have extracted that into a folder on the desktop
ok
what is in the extracted folder exactly?
these are supporting files i think
there are 2 folders named as docs and patched
and other images of the real play interface
there are some executables also like one is named as "Realplay 10" and when i run it it says "There was an error launching the application"
are u there?
sorry i was afk
is there a website link for where you got this program?
i got it from th archive
what exactly is realplay anyway?
just a secong i m giving u the link
audio format?
I've converted legions of realplayer files to vorbis using mplayer.
http://archive.canonical.com/pool/partner/r/realplay/
i have downloaded the last one whose size is 6.5 M
And you are trying to run the script "realplay" ?
if it prints errors, try running it from gnome-terminal (Terminal)
i run that but that doesn't worked
open up Terminal, cd to Desktop/realplay-whatever, and run ./realplay and see what Terminal prints.
